CustomField.description: Used to score Sapper Consulting Wrap Up Calls.
CustomField.formula: (CASE( About_Abstrakt__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Ramp_Up_Period__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Monthly_Results_Meeting__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Reschedules_No_Shows__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Sapper_Timeline_of_Expectations__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( How_Do_You_Currently_Get_Leads__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( How_did_you_win_your_largest_client__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( What_s_your_average_deal_size__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( What_does_first_interaction_look_like__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( How_do_you_track_follow_ups__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( What_Are_Your_Specific_Goals__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( What_is_the_expectation_on_closed_deals__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( How_will_you_define_success_after_1_year__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Payment__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Account_Details__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(CFS_Score__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0))/32
CustomField.label: Sapper Wrap-Up Score
